page.syntax: Ulink as C = a5ws_Get_Ulink_From_GUID(C user_guid [,* request ])

argument.name: Ulink
argument.description: The ulink value of a person in the web security user table.

argument.name: user_guid
argument.description: The unique ID assigned to a user in the web security system.

argument.name: request
argument.description: Optional. The Request system variable. It is added automatically by the server when run from a web page.

page.description: Returns a users 'ulink' value from a user_guid in the current project. If the user link field is not activated, an empty value is returned. 'Request' is added automatically by the server when run from a web page
page.discussion: The A5WS_Get_Ulink_From_GUID() returns a user's 'ulink' value from the unique identifier assigned to them in web security. If the user link field is not activated, an empty value is returned. 'Request' is added automatically by the server when run from a web page.

see.ref: Returns a user's 'ulink' value from her unique web security identifier
